ai-tha-ap124:1.3_0: you dwell in the midst of that you.
ai-tha-ap124:2.2_0: May they live together and be each other
ai-tha-ap124:2.3_0: And gradually they made a wish,
ai-tha-ap124:3.1_0: the Buddha in the world, having arisen in the world,
ai-tha-ap124:3.2_0: you must tell us to know, Master Gotama.
ai-tha-ap124:3.3_0: Not grasping among the those who are hermaphrodites,
ai-tha-ap124:4.3_0: When they heard what she said,
ai-tha-ap124:5.3_0: In that case, the great hero,
ai-tha-ap124:5.4_0: and for stay in the world.
ai-tha-ap124:6.3_0: joyful intent on what is beneficial,
ai-tha-ap124:7.2_0: we will see the Realized One.
ai-tha-ap124:7.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap124:8.1_0: I went out to sleep up alone,
ai-tha-ap124:9.1_0: and all the gods, after taking them together,
ai-tha-ap124:9.4_0: the Buddha, who has reached perfect awakening,
ai-tha-ap124:10.4_0: They teach me my face to face:
ai-tha-ap124:11.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap124:12.3_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap124:12.4_0: The Teacher, having advised the talk of the Teacher,
ai-tha-ap124:13.2_0: the Holy One, the peaceful one,
ai-tha-ap124:13.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap124:17.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcakaṅga.
ai-tha-ap124:18.1_0: She presented the flowers to the flowers of the Flame Tree
